title: Can't open youtube
content: After the last Firefox update, i am trying to open youtube.com in my Firefox browser but it's not letting me to do it. Every time i open it shows an error and says that the error is from YOUTUBE and FIREFOX or I can do nothing about it. But the funny part is its working on other browsers like chrome.
creator: sharma99karambir

title: Firefox only partially working -cannot erase entries or add files to messages
content: FYI my internet provider, Rogers Telecomm. is recovering from a major system shutdown. Also, my Gmail account is working normally. With my Firefox account, it is working normally on my cellphone, but on my laptop, only the last 10 hours of messages are accessible, none of the essential tools (delete messages, etc.) on the toolbar are working, and I cannot attach files to messages I create. One more thing, the internet provider for my cellphone is not Rogers Telecomm, but is Virgin Plus. Is this a problem with Firefox, or is it caused by the problems that Rogers Telecomm is having getting their system back in operation?
creator: alaucis

title: Feedback on layout / colours / style as I was caught out.
content:
I am sorry, I recently said that buttons to open the profile directory were missing.

I was wrong.

But when you look at the screen where it is described and then you see the screen as I see it - with DARK THEME set you can see how/why I could easily miss seeing the button.

I feel there needs to be better ... separation (?) between the text and button. It is a lot easier to see in the light/default theme.
creator: teeny_weeny
